name: A Grave Situation
description:
This game was made for Brackey's Game Jam 2023.1

The theme was "An end is a  new beginning."

From depths of the Earth where the Void was spawned, a sorcerer named Abbadon rises… Thought destroyed a millennia ago, but they survived by hiding in the Void itself. Through terrible magics and rituals, the Cult of the Void brought them back to finally achieve its goal and sin: Immortality. We must make an exception. We must fight fire with fire. We have only one chance to survive this. We must raise the Lost Hero.

A grave situation is a metroidvania lite with a motif of death and resurrection. You play as a fallen warrior, named simply "The Hero", brought back by Death to fight a threat you had slain once before.
